trait.name: Chakra
entries: Naruto has 104 chakra points which he can expend. All chakra points are regained at the end of a long rest.

trait.name: Brawn/Endurance
entries: When Naruto is targeted by an area effect that lets him make a Strength or Constitution saving throw to take only half damage, such as fireball, he instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if he fails the save.

trait.name: Ninja Speed
entries: Naruto can take the dash, dodge, and disengage actions as a bonus action, and can move along vertical surfaces.

trait.name: Tailed Beasts
entries: Datara must spend 1 less chakra on all jutsu (included in actions), he regains 10 hit points at the start of each of his turns, he has advantage on Strength and Dexterity checks and saving throws, and has a damage reduction of 5.

trait.name: Dying Breath
entries: At the beginning of each of Naruto's turns that he is {@condition unconscious}, he may ignore the condition and immediately take a turn. At the end of his turn, he gains 1 level of {@condition exhaustion}. If he was {@condition unconscious} from having 0 hit points, he does not make a death saving throw at the beginning of that turn, and he regains the {@condition unconscious} condition and gains a failed death saving throw at the end of his turn.

trait.name: Immensity
entries: Datara can move through the space of a creature or object of Gargantuan size or smaller, and it does not treat such creatures as difficult terrain. If it moves through a creature's space, the creature must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 55 ({@damage 10d10}) bludgeoning damage on a failure. A creature can only be made to make this save once per round.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
entries: If the zombie fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: Datara deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: One With Everything
entries: Datara's chakra is identical to the ambient chakra of the world. Attempts to locate it with magic have disadvantage.
Chakra Constitution Datara has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects. All of Kurama's attacks are considered magical for the sake of overcoming resistances.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Naruto can make 3 unarmed strike attacks.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 5d4 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Hidden Chakra
entries: As a bonus action, Kurama regains 25 chakra points.

action.name: Chakra Transfer (1+ Chakra)
entries: Kurama grants one creature he can touch a number of Red Chakra equal to the amount he spends.

action.name: Tailed Beast Shockwave (3+ Chakra)
entries: Each creature within a 5 ft. radius must succeed a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw or take 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) force damage and be pushed to the edge of this jutsu's range. Kurama can add an additional 5 ({@damage 1d8}) damage and 5 feet to the affected radius and the distance the target is pushed for every 2 additional chakra point spent. If more than 20 chakra is spent, the ground and buildings within range take double damage. Kurama may spend 4 additional chakra separate from the previous effects to use this as a reaction, causing the ranged attacks it may be made in response to to miss in addition to its normal effects.

action.name: Tailed Beast Bomb (20 Chakra)
entries: All creatures in a 10 ft. by 60 ft. line or 20 ft. radius 60 ft. from Kurama must succeed a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, they take 57 ({@damage 10d10 + 2}) force damage, are pushed to the closest edge of the area, and fall {@condition prone}. On a success, they take half as much damage. This jutsu ignores evasion.

action.name: Ten-Tails Beam (3 Chakra)
entries: Every creature within a 60 ft. line must attempt {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) force damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. Kurama may use this jutsu up to 10 times on a single action.

action.name: Ten-Tails Fission (10 Chakra)
entries: The Ten-Tails creates one White Zetsu within 15 ft. of it.

action.name: Transformation (1 Chakra)
entries: Kurama becomes identical to a person, creature or non-magical object he a complete visual image of. This can not be a light source, armor, tool, or vehicle and, and he can not recreate a magical effect. Creatures must make a {@dc 18} Investigation check to realize that he is transformed. If the creature saw him performing the Jutsu, they automatically succeed. This does not change statistics, save for granting the creature's swimming and flying speeds.

action.name: Body Flicker (2 Chakra)
entries: Kurama's movement speed doubles, and his movement does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

reaction.name: Substitution (2+ Chakra)
entries: When Kurama is hit by an attack and would take damage, he decreases the damage by 25 ({@dice 1d10 + 20}) and teleports up to 15 ft. in any direction to an unoccupied space, during which he takes the Hide action. A generic object is left in his place and he takes any remaining damage from that attack. Kurama can add reduce this damage by an additional 6 ({@dice 1d10}) points per chakra point spent over the initial cost.

trait.name: Chakra
entries: Kurama has 103 chakra points which he can expend. All chakra points are regained at the end of a long rest.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: When Kurama is targeted by an area effect that lets him make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, such as fireball, he instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if he fails the save.

trait.name: Ninja Speed
entries: Kurama can take the dash, dodge, and disengage actions as a bonus action, and can move along vertical surfaces.

trait.name: Tailed Beasts
entries: Kurama must spend 1 less chakra on all jutsu (included in actions), he regains 10 hit points at the start of each of his turns, he has advantage on Strength and Dexterity checks and saving throws, and has a damage reduction of 5.

trait.name: Emotion Sense
entries: Kurama can sense the presence of magic and chakra within 30 feet of him. If he senses magic or chakra in this way, he can use his action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears either or both, and he learns its school of magic or the chakra technique used, if any. This effect can penetrate most barriers, but is blocked by 1 foot of stone, 1 inch of Common metal, a thin sheet of lead, or 3 feet of wood or dirt.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Kurama can make 3 unarmed strikes.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 5d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Hidden Chakra
entries: As a bonus action, Kurama regains 20 chakra points.

action.name: Chakra Transfer (1+ Chakra)
entries: Kurama grants one creature he can touch a number of Red Chakra equal to the amount he spends.

If more than 20 chakra is spent, the ground and buildings within range take double damage. Kurama may spend 4 additional chakra separate from the previous effects to use this as a reaction, causing the ranged attacks it may be made in response to to miss in addition to its normal effects.

On a failure, they take 59 ({@damage 10d10 + 4}) force damage, are pushed to the closest edge of the area, and fall {@condition prone}. On a success, they take half as much damage. This jutsu ignores evasion.

action.name: Nine-Tails Beam (3 Chakra)
entries: Every creature within a 60 ft. line must attempt {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 15 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) force damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. Kurama may use this jutsu up to 9 times on a single action.

action.name: Transformation (1 Chakra)
entries: Kurama becomes identical to a person, creature or non-magical object he a complete visual image of. This can not be a light source, armor, tool, or vehicle and, and he can not recreate a magical effect. Creatures must make a {@dc 18} Investigation check to realize that he is transformed. If the creature saw him performing the Jutsu, they automatically succeed. This does not change statistics, save for granting the creature's swimming and flying speeds.

Kurama can add reduce this damage by an additional 6 ({@dice 1d10}) points per chakra point spent over the initial cost.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Gyuki can make 3 unarmed strikes.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 5d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Hidden Chakra

action.name: Chakra Transfer (1+ Chakra)

action.name: Tailed Beast Shockwave (3+ Chakra)
entries: Each creature within a 5 ft. radius must succeed a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw or take 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) force damage and be pushed to the edge of this jutsu's range. Gyuki can add an additional 5 ({@damage 1d8}) damage and 5 feet to the affected radius and the distance the target is pushed for every 2 additional chakra point spent. If more than 20 chakra is spent, the ground and buildings within range take double damage. Gyuki may spend 4 additional chakra separate from the previous effects to use this as a reaction, causing the ranged attacks it may be made in response to to miss in addition to its normal effects.

action.name: Tailed Beast Bomb (20 Chakra)
entries: All creatures in a 10 ft. by 60 ft. line or 20 ft. radius 60 ft. from Gyuki must succeed a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, they take 59 ({@damage 10d10 + 4}) force damage, are pushed to the closest edge of the area, and fall {@condition prone}. On a success, they take half as much damage. This jutsu ignores evasion.

action.name: Tailed Beast Eight Twists (7 Chakra)
entries: Gyuki makes an attack against every creature within 10 ft.

action.name: Shadow Clone (4+ Chakra/Clone)
entries: Gyuki creates up to five clones. The clones have 5 hit points each and they have the chakra spent creating them. The clones can take actions as normal, however they do not benefit from the Extra Attack feature. You control them and they act on the same initiative as you. They last until they are reduced to 0 hit points, they expend all of their chakra, Gyuki dismisses them at will, or Gyuki falls {@condition unconscious}. If the clone still has chakra when it dissipates, he regains any remaining chakra from the clone - 4 (minimum 0).
Shadow clones have no range limit as to how far away they can be.
Any effects affecting Gyuki when the clone is created carries over to the clone.

A shadow clone carries a copy of all his equipment, however it does not carry the magical effects over from it beside any base attack roll, damage roll, or AC bonuses (i.e. a cloned vorpal sword is just a +3 sword in the hand of a clone).

While the clone is active, you are aware of its current activities (such as sleeping, eating, running, fighting or even calculus). When a shadow clone dissipates, the main body will receive any knowledge, experiences and memories it has acquired as if it experienced it itself, as well as matching your shadow clone's {@condition exhaustion} and gradual blindness, deafness, and numbness level (i.e. If you have an {@condition exhaustion} level of 2 while your shadow clone has 5, your {@condition exhaustion} level will increase to 5), but it will not suffer negative effects such as curses, poison or anything of the like.

action.name: Sealing Technique
entries: Octopus Hold (1 Chakra). When Gyuki creates a shadow clone, he may imbue it with Gyūki's ink. When it is destroyed by any means other than being dispelled, the closest creature to the clone must attempt a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw. On a failure, they are {@condition restrained}. They may retry this saving throw at the end of each of their turns, ending this effect on a success. This also causes you to not regain the base chakra spent to create the clone.

action.name: Transformation (1 Chakra)
entries: Gyuki becomes identical to a person, creature or non-magical object he a complete visual image of. This can not be a light source, armor, tool, or vehicle and, and he can not recreate a magical effect. Creatures must make a {@dc 18} Investigation check to realize that he is transformed. If the creature saw him performing the Jutsu, they automatically succeed. This does not change statistics, save for granting the creature's swimming and flying speeds.

action.name: Body Flicker (2 Chakra)
entries: Gyuki's movement speed doubles, and his movement does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

reaction.name: Substitution (2+ Chakra)
entries: When Gyuki is hit by an attack and would take damage, he decreases the damage by 25 ({@dice 1d10 + 20}) and teleports up to 15 ft. in any direction to an unoccupied space, during which he takes the Hide action. A generic object is left in his place and he takes any remaining damage from that attack. Gyuki can add reduce this damage by an additional 6 ({@dice 1d10}) points per chakra point spent over the initial cost.

action.name: Wisdom Wolf Decay (19 Chakra)
entries: Every creature within a 60 ft. radius must succeed a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, they take 11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) acid damage. For 1 minute after, creatures must retry this saving throw every time they end their turn within this area. The cloud can be blown away with a sufficiently powerful wind.

action.name: Leech Gap (1 Chakra)
entries: As a bonus action, Saiken exudes a white, glue-like Acid across your entire body. If a creature attempts to grapple Saiken or restrain them with an object, they or the object take 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) acid damage. Saiken's unarmed strikes deal acid damage, and reduce the target's AC by 2 for 1 minute.

action.name: Soap Bubble Ninjutsu (15 Chakra)
entries: Saiken exhales a 15 foot radius cloud of bubbles. Once per turn per creature when a creature spends more than 10 ft. of movement while with this area, they must succeed a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, they take 11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning or acid damage.

action.name: Transformation (1 Chakra)
entries: Saiken becomes identical to a person, creature or non-magical object he a complete visual image of. This can not be a light source, armor, tool, or vehicle and, and he can not recreate a magical effect. Creatures must make a {@dc 18} Investigation check to realize that he is transformed. If the creature saw him performing the Jutsu, they automatically succeed. This does not change statistics, save for granting the creature's swimming and flying speeds.

action.name: Body Flicker (2 Chakra)

action.name: Unrivaled Strength (4 Chakra)
entries: As a bonus action, Kokuō heats his chakra to the boiling point. He must spend at least 3 chakra at the beginning of each consecutive turn to maintain the following benefits, gaining a second stack of them for every 3 additional chakra spent:
Kokuō deals an additional 5 ({@damage 2d4}) fire damage from all sources.
Kokuō's movement speed increases by 10 feet.

action.name: Horn Breaking (5 Chakra)
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 5d4 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. Kokuō can make 2 of these attacks with advantage when he uses this jutsu, and can move up to 15 feet toward his target as part of this action.

action.name: Transformation (1 Chakra)
entries: Kokuō becomes identical to a person, creature or non-magical object he a complete visual image of. This jutsu ignores evasion.

action.name: Monkey Flame Arson (14 Chakra)
entries: Every creature within range must succeed a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking 36 ({@damage 6d10 + 3}) fire damage on a failure and are knocked {@condition prone}. On a success, they take half as much and are not knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Flower-Fruit Mountain (19 Chakra)
entries: Son Gokū summons a 20 ft. radius, 40 ft. tall volcano, anywhere within 20 feet. The volcano spews a flower of molten rocks in a 60 foot radius, causing all creatures within range to make a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw, taking 36 ({@damage 5d12 + 3}) fire damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. Son Gokū can choose up to3 to not be affected by this saving throw, causing the earth to temporarily shield them from the eruption. The volcano and the area of effect are considered difficult terrain to all but Son Gokū.

For 1 minute (concentration), Son Gokū can use his bonus action to make a ranged spell attack (+9) against any creature within 20 ft. to deal 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage and 4 ({@damage 1d8}) fire damage.

action.name: Transformation (1 Chakra)
entries: Son Gokū becomes identical to a person, creature or non-magical object he a complete visual image of. This can not be a light source, armor, tool, or vehicle and, and he can not recreate a magical effect. Creatures must make a {@dc 17} Investigation check to realize that he is transformed. If the creature saw him performing the Jutsu, they automatically succeed. This does not change statistics, save for granting the creature's swimming and flying speeds.

action.name: Body Flicker (2 Chakra)
entries: Son Gokū's movement speed doubles, and his movement does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

reaction.name: Substitution (2+ Chakra)
entries: When Son Gokū is hit by an attack and would take damage, he decreases the damage by 25 ({@dice 1d10 + 20}) and teleports up to 15 ft. in any direction to an unoccupied space, during which he takes the Hide action. A generic object is left in his place and he takes any remaining damage from that attack. Son Gokū can add reduce this damage by an additional 6 ({@dice 1d10}) points per chakra point spent over the initial cost.

trait.name: Chakra
entries: Isobu has 87 chakra points which he can expend. All chakra points are regained at the end of a long rest.

trait.name: Endurance
entries: When Isobu is targeted by an area effect that lets him make a Constitution saving throw to take only half damage, such as fireball, he instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if he fails the save.

trait.name: Ninja Speed
entries: Isobu can take the dash, dodge, and disengage actions as a bonus action, and can move along vertical surfaces.

trait.name: Tailed Beasts
entries: Isobu must spend 1 less chakra on all jutsu (included in actions), he regains 10 hit points at the start of each of his turns, he has advantage on Strength and Dexterity checks and saving throws, and has a damage reduction of 5.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Isobu can make 3 unarmed strikes.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 5d4 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. Isobu may spend 2 chakra to decrease the target's movement speed by 5 feet until the end of their next turn.

action.name: Hidden Chakra
entries: As a bonus action, Isobu regains 17 chakra points.

action.name: Chakra Transfer (1+ Chakra)
entries: Isobu grants one creature he can touch a number of Red Chakra equal to the amount he spends.

action.name: Tailed Beast Shockwave (3+ Chakra)
entries: Each creature within a 5 ft. radius must succeed a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) force damage and be pushed to the edge of this jutsu's range. Isobu can add an additional 5 ({@damage 1d8}) damage and 5 feet to the affected radius and the distance the target is pushed for every 2 additional chakra point spent. If more than 20 chakra is spent, the ground and buildings within range take double damage. Isobu may spend 4 additional chakra separate from the previous effects to use this as a reaction, causing the ranged attacks it may be made in response to to miss in addition to its normal effects.

action.name: Tailed Beast Bomb (20 Chakra)
entries: All creatures in a 10 ft. by 60 ft. line or 20 ft. radius 60 ft. from Isobu must succeed a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, they take 58 ({@damage 10d10 + 3}) force damage, are pushed to the closest edge of the area, and fall {@condition prone}. On a success, they take half as much damage. This jutsu ignores evasion.

action.name: Shadow Strike (4 Chakra)
entries: Isobu's unarmed strikes gain a +1 bonus to their attack and damage rolls, his AC gains a +2 bonus, and when he hits a creatures with a melee attack, it must make a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. Isobu must spend 1 chakra at the end of each of his turns to maintain this effect.

action.name: Illusionary Mist (11+ Chakra)
entries: One creature within 30 ft. must attempt a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, they become taunted towards one creature of Isobu's choice on a failure. They may retry this saving throw at each of their turns, ending this effect early on a success.

action.name: Great Water Mass Bullet (11 Chakra)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 9} to hit, range 30 ft., two targets. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage and 6 ({@damage 1d12}) cold damage.
Additionally, when you cast this jutsu, you may target an additional creature for every 3 additional chakra spent.

action.name: Transformation (1 Chakra)
entries: Isobu becomes identical to a person, creature or non-magical object he a complete visual image of. This can not be a light source, armor, tool, or vehicle and, and he can not recreate a magical effect. Creatures must make a {@dc 17} Investigation check to realize that he is transformed. If the creature saw him performing the Jutsu, they automatically succeed. This does not change statistics, save for granting the creature's swimming and flying speeds.

action.name: Body Flicker (2 Chakra)
entries: Isobu's movement speed doubles, and his movement does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

reaction.name: Substitution (2+ Chakra)
entries: When Isobu is hit by an attack and would take damage, he decreases the damage by 25 ({@dice 1d10 + 20}) and teleports up to 15 ft. in any direction to an unoccupied space, during which he takes the Hide action. A generic object is left in his place and he takes any remaining damage from that attack. Isobu can add reduce this damage by an additional 6 ({@dice 1d10}) points per chakra point spent over the initial cost.

action.name: Mouse Hairball (1 Chakra)
entries: Two creatures within 120 ft. take 3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) fire damage. Matatabi may use this jutsu up to 3 times on a single action.

action.name: Cat Flame Roaring Fire (7 Chakra)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 9} to hit, range 150 ft., one target. {@h}37 ({@damage 8d6 + 3}) fire damage.

action.name: Transformation (1 Chakra)
entries: Matatabi becomes identical to a person, creature or non-magical object he a complete visual image of. This can not be a light source, armor, tool, or vehicle and, and he can not recreate a magical effect. Creatures must make a {@dc 17} Investigation check to realize that he is transformed. If the creature saw him performing the Jutsu, they automatically succeed. This does not change statistics, save for granting the creature's swimming and flying speeds.

Matatabi can add reduce this damage by an additional 6 ({@dice 1d10}) points per chakra point spent over the initial cost.

trait.name: Chakra
entries: Shukaku has 75 chakra points which he can expend. All chakra points are regained at the end of a long rest.

trait.name: Endurance
entries: When Shukaku is targeted by an area effect that lets him make a Constitution saving throw to take only half damage, such as fireball, he instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if he fails the save.

trait.name: Ninja Speed
entries: Shukaku can take the dash, dodge, and disengage actions as a bonus action, and can move along vertical surfaces.

trait.name: Tailed Beasts

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Shukaku can make 3 unarmed strikes.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 5d4 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Hidden Chakra
entries: As a bonus action, Shukaku regains 16 chakra points.

action.name: Chakra Transfer (1+ Chakra)
entries: Shukaku grants one creature he can touch a number of Red Chakra equal to the amount he spends.

action.name: Tailed Beast Shockwave (3+ Chakra)
entries: Each creature within a 5 ft. radius must succeed a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) force damage and be pushed to the edge of this jutsu's range. Shukaku can add an additional 5 ({@damage 1d8}) damage and 5 feet to the affected radius and the distance the target is pushed for every 2 additional chakra point spent. If more than 20 chakra is spent, the ground and buildings within range take double damage. Shukaku may spend 4 additional chakra separate from the previous effects to use this as a reaction, causing the ranged attacks it may be made in response to to miss in addition to its normal effects.

action.name: Tailed Beast Bomb (20 Chakra)
entries: All creatures in a 10 ft. by 60 ft. line or 20 ft. radius 60 ft. from Shukaku must succeed a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, they take 58 ({@damage 10d10 + 3}) force damage, are pushed to the closest edge of the area, and fall {@condition prone}. On a success, they take half as much damage. This jutsu ignores evasion.

action.name: Desert Layered Imperial Funeral Seal (7 Chakra)
entries: One creature within 90 ft. must attempt a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw. On a failure, the target has total cover, is {@condition paralyzed}, and as a bonus action Shukaku can crush the target, causing them to attempt a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw, taking 16 ({@damage 3d10}) force damage on a failure or half as much on a success. This lasts for 1 minute (concentration), and they may attempt a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw at the end of each of their turns, ending this effect early on a success. Creatures within 5 ft. of the creature may attempt a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw as an action, ending this effect early on a success.

action.name: Drilling Air Bullet (14 Chakra)
entries: Every creature in a 60 x 25 foot line must make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the creatures take 30 ({@damage 6d8 + 3}) thunder damage and are pushed 40 ft away. If it collides with a creature or object, both take an additional 4 ({@damage 1d8}) bludgeoning damage. On a success, they take half as much damage.

action.name: Sand Buckshot (5+ Chakra)
entries: Shukaku creates 3 bullets. Each bullet can be directed at a creature dealing 2 ({@damage 1d4}) piercing damage per bullet. Shukaku may spend 2 chakra to fire 1 additional bullet.

action.name: Transformation (1 Chakra)
entries: Shukaku becomes identical to a person, creature or non-magical object he a complete visual image of. This can not be a light source, armor, tool, or vehicle and, and he can not recreate a magical effect. Creatures must make a {@dc 16} Investigation check to realize that he is transformed. If the creature saw him performing the Jutsu, they automatically succeed. This does not change statistics, save for granting the creature's swimming and flying speeds.

action.name: Body Flicker (2 Chakra)
entries: Shukaku's movement speed doubles, and his movement does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

reaction.name: Substitution (2+ Chakra)
entries: When Shukaku is hit by an attack and would take damage, he decreases the damage by 25 ({@dice 1d10 + 20}) and teleports up to 15 ft. in any direction to an unoccupied space, during which he takes the Hide action. A generic object is left in his place and he takes any remaining damage from that attack. Shukaku can add reduce this damage by an additional 6 ({@dice 1d10}) points per chakra point spent over the initial cost.
